title: WTB: T210-8 Chattanooga and T213-1 Bill Hart
author: destijl03

posts.post_title: WTB: T210-8 Chattanooga and T213-1 Bill Hart
posts.post_content:
Hey guys, I know this is probably a long shot considering these cards are always being searched for, but I’m looking to buy a T210-8 of any Chattanooga player and a T213-1 Bill Hart. 

My budget can most likely only accommodate low grade for both, raw or graded. Please PM me if anyone has one of either that you’re willing to part with!

Chris
